extendedInfo.description: "Lawsuit - The Unique Case Finder" is the Indian Case Law Research System developed by "Levons Technologies Pvt. Ltd." Using this application user can browse latest Judgments of Hon'ble Supreme Court of India since 1950 & All High Courts of India along with Privy Council cases since 1840. We also providing Central & State Bare Acts, Amendments with Rules, Regulations, Orders, Schemes etc. Case Laws Research System includes Topical Search, Advance Search, Full Text Search, Boolean Search, Citation Search, Bare Acts Search along with the ordering and priority search and sorting. This is perfect and unique legal case finder research system. This is one type of e-Library or digital library as you say.In case of any problem or query please feel free to contact us on : +918000841444 or Mail us on : lawsuitcasefinder@gmail.com
